public final class OpenFilesOptions

A class that encapsulates the options to the Desktop.openFiles(OpenFilesHandler, OpenFilesOptions) method.

Method Detail

create

public static OpenFilesOptions create()

setFilter

public OpenFilesOptions setFilter(java.lang.String[] filter)
By default, all files on the local disk are selectable. If a filter is provided, only files matching the filter are selectable. The user can turn the filter off, so be aware that selected files may not match the filter. The filter is an array of Internet content types and/or file extensions. Example: ['text/html', '.txt', 'image/*']

Parameters:
filter - An array of content types or file extensions to filter by
Returns:
this instance

setSingleFile

public OpenFilesOptions setSingleFile(boolean singleFile)
By default, the user may select multiple files. If true, the user is limited to selecting only one file.

Parameters:
singleFile - If true, the user may select only a single file
Returns:
this instance
